title: Landing Page For Adidas Shoes
description: A sleek landing page showcasing Adidas shoes with modern design and smooth animations. Features fully responsive layout optimized for all devices.

title: Task Management App
description: A feature-rich task management app with add, edit, delete, and filter functionality. Built with React Context API and Material-UI for a polished user experience.

title: Blog Website
description: A clean and minimal blog interface with responsive design. Demonstrates component-based architecture and modern CSS styling techniques.

title: Product Management System (CRUD)
description: A full CRUD system for managing products with create, read, update, and delete operations. Features local storage persistence and search functionality.

title: Random Quran Verse Generator
description: An Islamic app that displays random verses from the Holy Quran with Arabic text. Integrated with Quran API for authentic verse retrieval.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: Interactive Rock Paper Scissors game with score tracking and smooth animations. Features game logic, user vs computer gameplay, and responsive design.

title: Weather App
description: Real-time weather application showing current conditions and forecasts. Integrated with weather API to provide accurate location-based data.
